name: ANDY AFRO'S NSMBW MASHUP X
overview: A Collection of Custom NSMBW Levels Made Up of Spare Worlds and Spare Levels but I have had fun testing it. Some Levels are short but there are also Some Great Levels in there for You to Test. All Credit Given to the Makers of Levels Within Game as Usual;Big Thanks to all those at DU who continue to support me. (BIG THANKS TO MOOKIE AND WIICREW FOR THEIR EXTRA HELP AS WELL AS SHADOWPUPPET FOR UPLOADING THE COVERS)
